message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm still not convinced that $105 is a good price for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
